long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reeder - a minimal and open source reader extension for Google Chrome

UPDATE: Now featuring a unique stop word fading feature to help you skim through articles faster. Skip the stop words while reading, allowing you to read less and absorb more information efficiently.

Distraction-Free Reading Mode: Read any article in a distraction-free mode with a clean, ad-free layout. With just one click, open the reading view on top of any website, ensuring you stay focused on the content that matters.

Customizable Themes and Fonts: Quickly toggle between white, yellow, and dark themes to suit your reading preferences. Improve your reading experience by easily adjusting the font size and line height to match your comfort level.

Speed Reading Mode: Activate the speed reading mode for faster reading. Learn how it works and how you can enhance your reading speed by watching this informative video by Tim Ferriss: Speed Reading Video.

Open Source and Developer-Friendly: The source code of Reeder is open source. If you are a developer interested in contributing, feel free to send a pull request. Join our community and help improve the extension.

Key Features:

Distraction-Free Reading: Enjoy a clean, ad-free reading experience.
Stop Word Fading: Skim through articles faster by fading out stop words.
Customizable Themes: Switch between white, yellow, and dark themes.
Adjustable Fonts: Modify font size and line height for optimal reading comfort.
Speed Reading Mode: Enhance your reading speed with our speed reading feature.
Open Source: Contribute to the development of Reeder on GitHub.
Reeder is designed to help you minimize distractions and focus on the content that matters. Whether youâ€™re reading for work, study, or leisure, Reeder provides a seamless and enjoyable reading experience.
